fluidlogged.midnightconfig.title: Fluidlogged
fluidlogged.midnightconfig.restart: §c§lAll of the options below requires a restart
fluidlogged.midnightconfig.printFluidIds: Prints all fluid ids in the output log. Useful if you don't know the fluid id of a specific mod.
fluidlogged.midnightconfig.compatibility:
Some mods may cause incompatibilities with this mod.
Enabling this option will fix most issues 
and will only allow vanilla blocks to be waterloggable with any fluid.
